name: The White Pearl Hotel
description: Situated in Krabi Town, The White Pearl Hotel is a 5-minute drive from Krabi Pier. It features modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Free parking is available. The White Pearl is a 15-minute drive from Krabi International Airport and a 25-minute drive from Ao Nang Beach. Klong Muang Beach is a 35-minute drive away. Fitted with tiled flooring, air-conditioned rooms offer cable TV, a personal safe, and a fridge. Private bathrooms come with hot/cold shower facilities and a hairdryer. The restaurant serves a daily breakfast of Thai dishes. In-room breakfast and special diet menus are possible on request. Guests can make travel arrangements at the tour desk, or surf the web at the internet corner. The 24-hour front desk provides luggage storage, laundry and shuttle services.

name: Rocco Aonang Krabi
address: Rocco Ao-Nang Soi Klong Hang, Ao Nang 81180
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach in the Krabi Province region, with Nopparat Thara Beach and Ao Nang Beach nearby, Rocco Aonang Krabi provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. Rocco Aonang Krabi offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room and year-round outdoor pool. Pai Plong Beach is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Rocco Aonang Krabi.

name: Anacar Bungalows
description: Set in Krabi town, within 1.2 km of Nopparat Thara Beach and 1.4 km of Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium, Anacar Bungalows offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 12 km from Gastropo Fossils The World Museum, 13 km from Dragon Crest Mountain and 17 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram. The guest house features family rooms. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. At the guest house every room includes a private bathroom. Anacar Bungalows offers a terrace. Thara Park is 18 km from the accommodation, while Krabi Stadium is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 24 km from Anacar Bungalows, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Kyongean Mansion 2
description: The 1.5-star Kyo-Ngean Mansion II offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Krabi. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, tours are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, balcony/terrace, television. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include garden. Kyo-Ngean Mansion II combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Krabi unforgettable.Agoda

name: Krabi Apartment Hotel
description: Krabi Apartment-SHA Extra Plus is located in Leela Valley, a 4-minute drive to Ao Nang Centre. The hotel offers free internet access, an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. The air-conditioned apartments come with a living room, kitchen and private balcony. A cable TV, hot water showers and views of the pool are available. The hotel features airport shuttles, motorbike rentals and laundry services. Other facilities include a tour desk and massage services. Krabi Apartment-SHA Extra Plus is approximately 18 km from Krabi International Airport.

name: Boutique Village Hotel
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 4.6 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium, Boutique Village Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The rooms come with air conditioning, and some units at the hotel have a terrace. All guest rooms at Boutique Village Hotel come with a seating area. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, Asian or vegetarian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ao Nang Beach, like cycling. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 11 km from Boutique Village Hotel, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Glur Hostel
description: Boasting a mountain backdrop, Glur Hostel is located in a peaceful area in Aonang. A 15-minute walk from the beach, it features an outdoor common area with a 42-inch flat-screen TV and DVD player. Glur Hostel offers private rooms and dormitories, all combining white furniture and bright blue walls. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with private lockers and bath amenities. The hostel provides free rental of a laptop, as well as books and reed mats. Travel arrangements can be organised at the tour desk. Wi-Fi is free in public areas, and free private parking is available on site. Guests can prepare their own meals in the shared kitchen area, which has a fridge and microwave. Coffee, tea, and hot and cold drinking water are provided free of charge. Glur Hostel is 45 minutes’ drive from Krabi Airport. It is a 15-minute boat ride from Tonsai and Railay beaches.

name: Villa Macaque and Villa Languor
description: The Second House - The Wood &The White is situated in Ao Nang, just 35 minutes from Krabi International Airport. It is also a short car trip from Ton Sai Beach and Ao Phra Nang. The Second House - The Wood &The White provides cozy rooms, designed to suit the needs of any traveler. The hotel is an ideal place to explore nearby Ko Poda and Nopparat Thara Beach. Khlong Muang Beach can be easily accessed by car.HotelsCombined

name: Crystal Hotel Krabi
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, Crystal Hotel Krabi puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with additional bathroom, additional toilet, clothes rack, linens, mirror. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Crystal Hotel Krabi caters to your needs.Agoda
